Steps to Reproduce: Open the website link in a browser
Click on 'Products' from the navigation menu
Search for 'Sofa' in the search bar
Select a product and click 'Add to Cart' button
Expected Result: Product is added to the cart
Actual Result: Product added to the cart successfully

Steps to Reproduce: Proceed to checkout and enter dummy payment details
Open the website on a mobile device
Expected Result: Website adjusts to mobile screen size
